summary: A home for the adventurer far from the cities.
descriptionHtml:
Riverwatch is a player home located along the river from Whiterun to Soltitude. The house has a visible map marker no discovery needed. 

This home has all the essentials you need: Alchemy table, Enchanting table, Forge, Armor workbench, Sharpening stone, Tanning rack, Coocking pot, Weapon displays, and safe storage. 

This is my first go at the Creation Kit i appriciate any response and thoughts about improving my mod.

Also avaviable on Steam Workshop.

Install - Place the ESP. file in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data and activate with NMM or Launcher.

Changelog
1.1 - Added a note explaining the reason for you to take posession of the property.
1.2 - Cleaned up interior a bit, repositioned the enchanting table, added dust effect.
1.3 - Basement added. The enchanting and alchemy tables have been moved to the basement, theres also two manequinns a weapon rack and three weapon displays.
1.4 - Navmesh added.
1.5 - Mannequins have been fixed, a light on the bridge without a source has been removed, it may have caused a drop in fps.

Thanks to
Bethesda Softworks for a excellent game and finaly releasing the Construction Kit.
author: NottingHillbillie
